shutdown.title: Warning
shutdown.content: Are you sure to turn off the Scrcpy control service?

deviceControl.inputScreenSize: Please enter the screen size of the current control device correctly
deviceControl.closeCurDevice: Please close the current control device first
deviceControl.controlInfo: The screen size has been saved and the control service is starting. Please keep the device screen on.

Device.inputWirelessAddress: Please enter the wireless debugging address

deviceSize.title: Device screen size
deviceSize.tip: Tip: Please enter the screen size of the current control device correctly. This is a necessary parameter to successfully send touch events.
